name: Save The Chickens!
description:
A simple little maze game with one level! You get 3 lives to get the robot through the maze and save every chicken! Grab all the chickens to win!

Controls: 

WASD to move

Escape to pause

Walk into teleporters to move quickly across the map

Avoid snakes, crocodiles shooting frogs and water as a little robot

Check the controls menu for images of each item!
